name: sfchronicle
text:
Alex Padilla and Shirley Weber, Gov. Gavin Newsom’s two newest choices for statewide office, served notice Wednesday that they will be on the ballot in 2022.

https://t.co/xGvySdOEcT

name: sfchronicle
text:
San Francsico Mayor London Breed and all 11 members of the Board of Supervisors chose to either decline or donate their pay raises this year, amid a massive city budget deficit that may force layoffs and service cuts.

https://t.co/f2hU6wbdYy

name: sfchronicle
text: One week after Chinatown leaders called on San Francisco for targeted financial aid, officials are talking about a potential $1.9 million relief plan for the historic neighborhood’s restaurants. https://t.co/W01xiOcBMf

name: sfchronicle
text:
Help isn’t coming for the Warriors right away.

Draymond Green will not play on Christmas at Milwaukee as the power forward still needs to see some improvement in his injured right foot before returning, head coach Steve Kerr said.

https://t.co/SloXv56Nq1

name: sfchronicle
text: “Despite the case rate in the Bay Area at its highest since the beginning of the pandemic, our hospitalization, ICU and death rate has remained lower than other cities, including Los Angeles,” said Monica Gandhi, an infectious disease specialist at UCSF.  https://t.co/ECSbYe4FSW

name: sfchronicle
text:
Stony Hill Vineyard, one of Napa’s most well-loved historic wineries, is now owned by Arkansas billionaire Gaylon Lawrence Jr. and Carlton McCoy, Jr. Esteemed winemaker Jaimee Motley will take the reigns.

https://t.co/4TlI7GVaD8

name: sfchronicle
text: Many California residents have ignored increasingly desperate public health pleas to not travel or gather for the holidays. The state could experience “a surge on top of a surge on top of a surge unless we are careful and mindful,” said Gov. Newsom. https://t.co/ACV9wBKl13

name: sfchronicle
text: Officials from Placer and El Dorado counties and the town of Truckee have written to Airbnb asking it to help halt rentals in the Lake Tahoe area that violate California’s stay-at-home order amid the latest coronavirus surge. https://t.co/bVNskLOrDQ

name: sfchronicle
text:
Lenn Keller spent 40 years collecting ephemera to help form the Bay Area Lesbian Archives.

https://t.co/xasjyJCueJ
